entities.description: Usually work 35 or more hours per week at all jobs or businesses.
Reason for not working at a job in the past week.
Reason for not having a job in the past week.
Efforts made to find work in the past 30 days.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent usually works 35 or more hours per week.
Specifies the reason the respondent did not work in the past week.
Specifies the reason the respondent did not have a job in the past week.
Indicates whether the respondent made efforts to find work in the past 30 days.
